price: Ba bandi bahakanye bakanakumira (abantu) kugana inzira ya Allah, tuzabongerera ibihano hejuru y’ibindi kubera ko bajyaga bakwirakwiza ubwangizi (bigomeka kuri Allah bakanabishishikariza abandi).
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ زِدۡنَٰهُمۡ عَذَابٗا فَوۡقَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يُفۡسِدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi zid'nāhum ʿadhāban fawqa al-ʿadhābi bimā kānū yuf'sidūna
